snippet: Gemologist pulled away from Alpha in the final 100 yards in the $1 million Wood Memorial at Aqueduct.
abstract: Horse Racing Roundup; racehorse Gemologist earns a Kentucky Derby spot with a win in the $1 million Wood Memorial at Aqueduct; other racing results noted.
lead_paragraph: Gemologist pulled away from Alpha in the final 100 yards in the $1 million Wood Memorial at Aqueduct.

headline.seo: Gemologist Wins Wood Memorial, Securing Place in Derby Field
headline.main: Gemologist Earns Spot in Kentucky Derby With Win in Wood Memorial
headline.print_headline: Gemologist Earns Spot in Kentucky Derby With Win in Wood Memorial
